20.eng-name: The Book of Qiyam Al-Lail (The Night Prayer) and Voluntary Prayers During the Day

hadiths.text: Mansur reported from Al-Hakam, from Miqsam, that Umm Salamah said:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) used to pray witr with five and seven rak'ahs which he did not separate with any taslim nor talk

chapter.ara-name: باب كَيْفَ الْوِتْرُ بِخَمْسٍ وَذِكْرِ الاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى الْحَكَمِ فِي حَدِيثِ الْوِتْرِ
chapter.eng-name: How to pray witr with five rak'ahs, and the differences reported from Al-Hakam in the hadith about Witr
